EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Cloud Native Roadshow_2017.Sydney Reminder
EmailTemplate.subject: See you tomorrow at the Cloud-Native Roadshow
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
We are looking forward to seeing you tomorrow in Sydney at the Cloud-Native Roadshow. Please review the event details below and feel free to email the team at cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io <[[mailto:cloudnativeroadshow@pivotal.io]]> with any questions.
Date: Tuesday, September 12, 2017
Time: 8:30am - 4:00pm
Location: Pivotal Level 11, 155 Clarence Street, Sydney NSW 2000 (map <[[https://www.google.com/maps?q=Level+11,+155+Clarence+Street,+Sydney+NSW+2000&oe=utf-8&um=1&ie=UTF-8&sa=X&ved=0ahUKEwjJiLm0ouHVAhXDyFQKHVfwATAQ_AUICigB]]>)
Agenda:
Review the full agenda HERE <[[https://pivotal.io/event/pivotal-cloud-native-roadshow/sydney?utm_source=pivotal-email&utm_medium=email-link&utm_campaign=cloud-native-roadshow-2017]]>.
We look forward to seeing you! The Pivotal Team
